page.title: 01Countryside of lansallos
page.content: The landscape is of gently rolling fields divided into small farm units. Some of these have been combined to form larger units and their redundant farmhouses and barns and buildings converted into holiday accommodation for the tourist trade. The economy of the whole area is dominated by farming and tourism. The village of Lansallos has been overshadowed by the growth and popularity of nearby Polperro-to the East-which has become almost a Mecca for tourists visiting the West Country. This provides good employment during the summer season.
